name: Projects & Action Tasks Notion Template
description: How's your to-do list looking? If you're anything like me, you've tried a bunch of different tools to find your fit. It took me a long time to commit to Notion. Ultimately, it came down to the fact I could manage my entire business in one place.If you're interested in managing projects and action tasks in Notion too, I've got you covered with this Action Zone template.This template is a step-by-step guide broken down into 4 sections:TargetsAction TasksProjectsCalendarThe template itself includes
